definition: double-edged sword/CL:口[kou3],把[ba3]/classifier for blows of a sword
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: He rowed No.8 in the Cambridge crew.
sentences.chinese: 他是剑桥大学划船队的8号划手。

sentences.english: Papers are sent to UCLES for marking.
sentences.chinese: 试卷被送往剑桥大学考试委员会打分。

sentences.english: Fergus won a scholarship to Cambridge.
sentences.chinese: 弗格斯获得了上剑桥大学的奖学金。

sentences.english: Sebastian graduated from the University of Cambridge with a MA degree in Engineering.
sentences.chinese: 陈颂铭先生毕业于剑桥大学，获工程硕士学位。

sentences.english: Cambridge University provides opportunities for academic achievement which are probab1y unequalled.
sentences.chinese: 剑桥大学为水平不一的有识之士提供学术研究的机会。

sentences.english: The Cambridge University rows against Oxford every year.
sentences.chinese: 剑桥大学每年与牛津大学进行划船比赛。

sentences.english: People always go into raptures at the mere mention of Oxbridge.
sentences.chinese: 人们只要一提到牛津剑桥大学就会很兴奋。

sentences.english: The son of a Canterbury shoemaker, he earned a degree from Cambridge University.
sentences.chinese: 他是坎特伯里一鞋匠的儿子，曾在剑桥大学取得学位。

sentences.english: This is the website of the Cambridge Crystallographic Data Centre.
sentences.chinese: 这是剑桥大学晶体学数据中心网站。

sentences.english: In 1991, Guinness received an Honorary Doctorate from Cambridge University.
sentences.chinese: 1991年吉尼斯获得剑桥大学名誉博士学位。

sentences.english: Oxford snuck into 4th spot, overtaking Cambridge, which slipped to 6th.
sentences.chinese: 英国牛津大学排名第4，剑桥大学下滑至第6。

sentences.english: A:Can I get to Cambridge University on this bus?
sentences.chinese: 这这趟车能到剑桥大学吗？

sentences.english: We expected him to be plucked on his tripos.
sentences.chinese: 我们预料他在剑桥大学荣誉学位考试中不及格。

sentences.english: Hawking retired last year as the Lucasian Chair of Mathematics at Cambridge University after 30 years in the position.
sentences.chinese: 霍金去年从剑桥大学卢卡斯数学教授的职位上退休了。

sentences.english: Gillian Tett has a PhD in social anthropology from Cambridge University.
sentences.chinese: 邰蒂在剑桥大学获得社会人文学博士学位。

sentences.english: His daughter is just down from Cambridge.
sentences.chinese: 他女儿刚从剑桥大学毕业。

pinyin: Lun2 dun1 Da4 xue2 Xue2 yuan4
Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4 Da4 xue2

definition: Imperial College of Science, Technology and Medicine, London
pinyin: Di4 guo2 Li3 gong1 Xue2 yuan4
Pu3 lin2 si1 dun4 Da4 xue2
Bin1 xi1 fa3 ni2 ya4 Da4 xue2
